column1: Wildberry Pancakes and Cafe////Sunday morning we were up to the task of finding a place to have breakfast. As we normally do before heading out
column2: we look on trusty yelp to help us out. We had found another place
column3: but still couldn't stop thinking about Wildberry. We said
column5: we'll go back. We ask "Where would you recommend for breakfast?" The lady immediately blurts out "Wildberry". Okay! Decision made!
